Hotel Grand MahalFrequently Asked Questions About Hotels In SrinagarJoin our travel community for the latest tips, guides, and exclusive offers!Subscribe You have already subscribed our newsletter!Thanks for Subscribing our newsletter!Have you ever daydreamed about taking a trip that could rival the splendor of a fairy tale? With our special Kashmir tour packages, you’re one step closer to that enchanting reality. Kashmir, the ‘Paradise on Earth,’ brims with panoramic landscapes and ethereal beauty, providing a cornucopia of breathtaking places to visit in Kashmir.Srinagar, a charming star among this dreamy scenery, emerges as a charming star, harmoniously blending the allure of nature with architectural marvels. The hotels in Srinagar reflect this captivating blend, providing unparalleled luxury with views that would leave poets speechless. Traditional houseboats float gently on the serene Dal Lake, and regal heritage hotels provide the ideal starting point for your Kashmir adventure.Selecting from the myriad hotels in Srinagar might seem overwhelming, but fear not. We’re here to guide you to the very best, those that provide not just a place to rest, but an experience to cherish.Embrace the grandeur of Srinagar, snuggle up with a hot kahwa, and get ready to embark on a magical journey. Because, with the right hotels in Srinagar, every morning you wake up to could be a picturesque postcard from paradise.15 Best Hotels In Srinagar1. Lalit Grand PalaceImage Source : Tripadvisor”The Lalit Grand Palace, nestled amid the beautiful cityscape of Srinagar, unquestionably ranks among the best hotels in Kashmir. One of the luxury hotels in Srinagar, this majestic establishment encapsulates a regal ambiance infused with traditional Kashmiri charm. Its sprawling lush gardens and stunning views of the Dal Lake create a tranquil haven for its guests. The Lalit isn’t just one of the hotels in Srinagar; it’s a heritage site offering a taste of royal living. The on site restaurant serves authentic Kashmiri food, providing gastronomic delights that complement the aesthetic beauty of the locale, making your stay a feast for all senses.Location: Gupkar Road, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 13,000 to INR 1,25,000 per night2. Vivanta By TajImage Source : Tripadvisor”Perched atop a hill with a commanding view of Dal Lake, Vivanta Dal View is an epitome of luxury and elegance among the best hotels in Srinagar. This hotel, with its 81 tastefully adorned rooms and suites, offers panoramic mountain and city vistas from every balcony. Some even boast private hot tubs for an extra touch of indulgence. Guests at Vivanta Dal View can enjoy a wealth of amenities. An infinity pool offering stunning views, a lush fruit orchard, a rejuvenating spa and a state-of-the-art fitness center all add to the allure. Culinary delights await at their on-site restaurants, serving traditional Kashmiri and international cuisines. As one of the luxury hotels in Srinagar, it boasts a strategic location near top attractions like the Dal Lake, Tulip Garden, and Shankaracharya Temple, making it an ideal choice for discerning travellers in Kashmir.Location: Kralsangri, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 15,000 to INR 80,000 per night3. Mughal HouseboatsImage Source : Mughal Houseboat”Experience the epitome of luxury at the Mughal Houseboats, one of the best hotels in Srinagar. Nestled on the tranquil banks of Dal Lake, these houseboats in Kashmir showcase the enchanting beauty of this UNESCO World Heritage Site. Constructed from cedar and adorned with intricately carved walnut furniture and plush carpeting, they ensure a stay that marries modern convenience with traditional Kashmiri charm.Located away from the city’s bustle, yet close enough for easy access to attractions, the Mughal Houseboats invite you to savor the serene lake views from your own balcony, relax in spacious bedrooms, or warm up by the fireplace. Services extend to Wi-Fi, laundry, and a kitchenette for your comfort.Beyond the houseboat, adventures await. Enjoy boating on Dal Lake, sightseeing tours of Srinagar, hikes in the hills, or shopping excursions. For a truly unforgettable Kashmiri experience, Mughal Houseboats rank amongst the best hotels in Srinagar.Location: Opposite The Lalit, Kabutar Khana, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 7,500 to INR 12,000 per nightv4. Heevan ResortsImage Source : Tripadvisor”Nestled in the picturesque valley of Srinagar, Fortune Resort Heevan reigns as one of the most charming resorts in Srinagar. It offers the splendor of the Zabarwan Mountains as a backdrop and is a mere stone’s throw from the enchanting Dal Lake and other must see tourist spots.This stunning hotel greets its guests with 39 lavishly appointed rooms and suites, each presenting an awe inspiring panorama of the idyllic surroundings. Modern comforts accompany these splendid views, ensuring a stay that’s as convenient as it is unforgettable.Luxuries at Fortune Resort Heevan don’t stop at room views. From complimentary Wi-Fi, a swimming pool, spa, and fitness center, to a library and business center, every need is met with grace. Moreover, its selection of restaurants and bars serve a myriad of flavors from Kashmiri to Continental, complemented by a 24-hour room service. Location: Opposite Deevan Colony, Nishat, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 9,500 to INR 16,000 per night5. Jamal ResortImage Source : Tripadvisor”Jamal Resorts, a 4 star oasis nestled in the Nishat region of enchanting Kashmir, is ranked among the best hotels in Srinagar. It spans a lavish 3-acre estate and provides a wide range of amenities. Guests are provided with an immersive experience of luxury, from spacious quarters outfitted with modern amenities to an energising health club and inviting swimming pool.The resort’s proximity to the captivating Dal Lake and other key tourist attractions in Srinagar adds to its allure. The on site restaurant, chic bar and bustling shopping mall ensure a lively stay, while the playground entertains the kids. The icing on the cake? A friendly, accommodating staff dedicated to making your stay memorable. Jamal Resorts truly embodies the essence of the best hotels in Srinagar.Location: JCI Complex, Nishat, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 2,300 to INR 5,900 per night6. Hotel Grand MahalImage Source : Tripadvisor”The 3-star Hotel Grand Mahal, located in the Nishat-Shalimar district of Srinagar is a treasure trove. It is only a short walk from the Shalimar Bagh Mughal Garden and provides easy access to attractions such as Dal Lake, Hari Parbat and Hazratbal Shrine. It promises a home away from home with 60 spacious rooms equipped with modern conveniences such as flat-screen TVs, minibars, and free Wi-Fi. Additional amenities such as a restaurant, a bar, a swimming pool and a spa enhance the overall guest experience.What distinguishes Hotel Grand Mahal is its attentive staff, which goes above and beyond to ensure guest satisfaction by providing services such as airport transfers, laundry, and room service to ensure a stress-free stay.Location: Ishber Road, Nishat, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 5,200 per night7. Centaur Lake ViewImage Source : Tripadvisor”Looking for a relaxing stay at one of Kashmir’s finest hotels? The Centaur Lake View Hotel provides a tranquil retreat in the heart of Srinagar. This hotel located near the iconic Dal Lake is your gateway to experiencing the region’s distinct charm.This hotel ensures a comfortable and leisurely stay by providing amenities such as a swimming pool, tennis and badminton courts, a restaurant and a bar. The spacious rooms, the majority of which have a beautiful view of the lake or mountains, are a haven of peace.Beyond the hotel’s promise of warm hospitality and efficient services, the allure of shopping in Kashmir‘s vibrant markets is only a short distance away. The friendly staff are ever ready to offer guidance on local attractions, and the hotel’s tour desk can set up memorable excursions. With all this and more, Centaur Lake View Hotel exemplifies the best in hotels in Kashmir. Be it visiting the enchanting Dal Lake, exploring temples, hiking to the Mughal Gardens or relishing local cuisine, your experiences are destined to be unforgettable.Location: Boulevard Road, Chashmashahi, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 6,400 to INR 18,000 per night8. Swiss Hotel KashmirImage Source : Swiss Hotel Kashmir”Nestled in the vibrant heart of Srinagar, Swiss Hotel Kashmir is an inviting, family friendly oasis, merely a 2-minute stroll from Dal Lake. This conveniently located hotel, enwrapped in lush greenery is an effortless gateway to notable attractions like the Shankaracharya Temple, Mughal Gardens and the International Golf Course. Choose from diverse, cozy accommodations, ranging from standard to deluxe rooms and family suites, each furnished with essential amenities like free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, cable TV and minibar for a seamless, relaxing stay. An array of dining experiences awaits, with options from an Indian and Continental restaurant, a coffee shop, to a bar. Besides, you can unwind at the swimming pool, stay fit at the fitness center or enjoy fun times at the games room. The friendly staff, excellent facilities, and affordable rates make Swiss Hotel Kashmir an ideal choice for travelers seeking a memorable Srinagar stay.Location: 172 Gagribal Road, Nehru Park, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 3,000 to INR 5,000 per night9. Bloomingdale CottagesImage Source : Bloomingdale Cottages”Nestled amidst verdant landscapes, Swiss Hotel Kashmir stands as a beacon of comfort and affordability among hotels in Srinagar. This family-friendly retreat, just two minutes away from the picturesque Dal Lake, and within proximity to Srinagar’s famous attractions like Shankaracharya Temple and Mughal Gardens, serves as the perfect base for your explorations.The hotel offers a range of accommodation choices, from standard rooms to spacious family suites, equipped with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, cable TV, and a minibar for a home-away-from-home experience. An inviting swimming pool, fitness center, and games room are at your disposal for leisure.Savor tantalizing Indian and Continental cuisines at the on-site restaurant, or unwind at the coffee shop and bar. With friendly staff and top notch amenities, Swiss Hotel Kashmir adds a touch of indulgence to your Srinagar experience.Location: 233 Residency Road, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 2,700 to INR 3,900 per night10. Impex Hill ResortsImage Source : Impex Hill Resorts”Nestled in the heart of Srinagar, Impex Hill Resorts offers a blend of comfort, style, and scenic splendor. This 3-star hotel in Srinagar boasts proximity to iconic tourist attractions like Dal Lake and the Mughal Gardens. From spacious rooms to stunning vistas of the Dal Lake and the Himalayas, it caters to guests with refined taste. Your culinary journey will be enhanced with their excellent dining options, and a plethora of leisure activities like swimming, boating, and hiking ensure your stay is exciting. The hotel staff is known for their helpfulness and warmth. Starting at ₹3,977 per night, it provides easy accessibility to local transport. Indulge in activities like boating in Dal Lake, exploring Mughal Gardens, mountain hiking, local market shopping, and sampling Kashmiri cuisine. Choose Impex Hill Resorts for an unforgettable Kashmir experience.Location: Gupkar Road, Shalimar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 3,977 onwards per night11. Hotel New Green ViewImage Source : Hotel New Green View”The 2-star Hotel New Green View offers a blend of comfort and charm, right on the banks of the iconic Dal Lake. With the backdrop of stunning mountains, this hotel is a gem among the hotels in Srinagar.The hotel comprises 30 well-appointed rooms, all boasting modern amenities such as air conditioning, heating, cable TV, and complimentary Wi-Fi. Tantalize your tastebuds with traditional Kashmiri cuisine at the hotel’s restaurant, or sip on a warm beverage at the coffee shop. A rooftop terrace provides breathtaking views, perfect for unwinding.Services like a 24-hour front desk, room service, laundry, travel desk, and car rental enhance your stay. Its prime location makes it an excellent starting point to explore the popular tourist spots like The Mughal Gardens, The Shankaracharya Temple, The Hazratbal Shrine, and The Shalimar Bagh.Location: Nehru Park, Dal Lake, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 1,200 onwards per night12. Hotel The MontrealImage Source : Hotel The Montreal”Hotel The Montreal, is a 4 start gem surrounded in the midst of Chinar trees, Nestled amidst stunning mountains and Chinar trees, Hotel The Montreal, a 4 star gem among the hotels in Srinagar, offers 36 rooms and suites that promise a perfect blend of comfort and style. Every room is a haven with high-speed internet, flat-screen TVs, minibars and coffee/tea makers, along with sleek bathrooms featuring roll-in showers, separate toilets, and hairdryers.Step into a world of luxury with an on-site restaurant serving an array of delicious Kashmiri and Indian cuisine, a well-stocked bar, a year-round swimming pool, and a state-of-the-art fitness center. Indulge in an array of spa treatments, offering the ultimate relaxation.The hotel’s strategic location, just a short drive from Shalimar Gardens, and its proximity to other popular tourist spots such as Dal Lake, Nishat Gardens, and Hazratbal Shrine make it a sought-after destination. Additionally, it’s only 5-10 minutes away from Srinagar International Airport and well-connected by public transport, allowing easy exploration of the city.Location: Shalimar, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 1,800 onwards per night13. Hotel Centre PointImage Source : Hotel Centre Point”Hotel Centre Point in Srinagar stands as a favored choice for those budget travellers seeking both comfort and convenience. Nestled in the vibrant Lal Chowk area, this hotel promises easy access to major attractions such as Dal Lake, Shankaracharya Temple, Hazratbal Mosque, and Shalimar Bagh.The hotel boasts an array of rooms—standard, deluxe, and family—all outfitted with essential amenities like air conditioning, heating, TV, and minibar for a worry-free stay. Their on-site facilities span a restaurant, a bar, a swimming pool, and a gym, ensuring guests’ leisure and relaxation.The courteous staff, always ready to assist, enhances the overall experience, assisting with tour arrangements and activities, and offering a complimentary airport shuttle. Among the many hotels in Srinagar, Hotel Centre Point stands out for its budget-friendly, comfort-rich experience, and prime location.Location: Bishamber Nagar, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 2,500 onwards per night14. Hotel Grand MahalImage Source : Hotel Grand Mahal”Nestled amidst emerald gardens, with the picturesque backdrop of mountains, Hotel Grand Mahal shines as one of the choicest hotels in Srinagar. An oasis of luxury, it sits conveniently close to the iconic Dal Lake and major attractions, making it an ideal pick for discerning travellers. It boasts 75 expansive, elegantly equipped rooms, complete with modern amenities such as air conditioning, cable TV, and complimentary Wi-Fi. For your leisure, the hotel encompasses an inviting swimming pool, an indulgent spa, and a restaurant and bar serving an array of Kashmiri and Indian delicacies alongside a wide selection of beverages.Top it off with a staff renowned for their warm hospitality, and you have a truly immersive Kashmiri experience awaiting at Hotel Grand Mahal Srinagar.Location: Gupt Ganga, Srinagar, Jammu and KashmirTariff: INR 5,200 onwards per nightIn summary, Srinagar is a treasure trove of experiences, enriched with natural splendour and a rich heritage. The city’s hotels enhance these experiences, providing an idyllic retreat with world class facilities and warm hospitality. Whether you’re seeking tranquillity by Dal Lake or a luxurious stay amidst vibrant local culture, Srinagar’s hotels cater to every kind of traveller. Each hotel is a sanctuary of comfort, offering unique insights into the city’s beauty and its people’s warmth.
